content: this is a simple beginner friendly pattern to help you crochet a pair of socks for your labubu it s just a base pattern so feel free to add things like little bows or other things to your labubu s socks to make them fit your personal style i used light fingering/ weight 1 sock yarn but any weight 1 yarn will do i used about 2g in this pattern i used hobbii s rainbow sock wool 4-ply in the color 29 stitches/ techniques you ll need to know chain single_crochet half_double_crochet working in the back loop
